channel.title: Variable RequiredValues
channel.description:
I'm trying to add new banking sprites & buttons to my client and it should be straight forward to follow the tutorial but for some reason Project Insanity always gives me errors lol. I've figured some stuff out myself getting rid of errors for other tutorials but this one has me stumped.
[code]RSInterface.java:236: error: cannot find symbol setChildren(19, Interface); ^ symbol: method setChildren(int,RSInterface) location: class RSInterface RSInterface.java:304: error: cannot find symbol hover.opacity = 0; ^ symbol: variable opacity location: variable hover of type RSInterface RSInterface.java:305: error: cannot find symbol hover.hoverType = hoverid; ^ symbol: variable hoverType location: variable hover of type RSInterface RSInterface.java:311: error: cannot find symbol hover.valueCompareType = new int[1]; ^ symbol: variable valueCompareType location: variable hover of type RSInterface RSInterface.java:312: error: cannot find symbol hover.requiredValues = new int[1]; ^ symbol: variable requiredValues location: variable hover of type RSInterface RSInterface.java:313: error: cannot find symbol hover.valueCompareType[0] = 1; ^ symbol: variable valueCompareType location: variable hover of type RSInterface RSInterface.java:314: error: cannot find symbol hover.requiredValues[0] = configId; ^ symbol: variable requiredValues location: variable hover of type RSInterface RSInterface.java:326: error: cannot find symbol hover.interfaceShown = true; ^ symbol: variable interfaceShown location: variable hover of type RSInterface RSInterface.java:327: error: cannot find symbol hover.hoverType = -1; ^ symbol: variable hoverType location: variable hover of type RSInterface RSInterface.java:328: error: method addSprite in class RSInterface cannot be app lied to given types; addSprite(hoverId2, hoverSpriteId, hoverSpriteId2, hoverSpriteNa me, ^ required: int,int,String found: int,int,int,String,int,int reason: actual and formal argument lists differ in length RSInterface.java:332: error: cannot find symbol setChildren(2, hover); ^ symbol: method setChildren(int,RSInterface) location: class RSInterface RSInterface.java:348: error: cannot find symbol hover.opacity = 0; ^ symbol: variable opacity location: variable hover of type RSInterface RSInterface.java:349: error: cannot find symbol hover.hoverType = hoverid; ^ symbol: variable hoverType location: variable hover of type RSInterface RSInterface.java:361: error: cannot find symbol hover.interfaceShown = true; ^ symbol: variable interfaceShown location: variable hover of type RSInterface RSInterface.java:362: error: cannot find symbol hover.hoverType = -1; ^ symbol: variable hoverType location: variable hover of type RSInterface RSInterface.java:363: error: method addSprite in class RSInterface cannot be app lied to given types; addSprite(hoverId2, hoverSpriteId, hoverSpriteId, hoverSpriteNam e, 0, 0); ^ required: int,int,String found: int,int,int,String,int,int reason: actual and formal argument lists differ in length RSInterface.java:366: error: cannot find symbol setChildren(2, hover); ^ symbol: method setChildren(int,RSInterface) location: class RSInterface RSInterface.java:377: error: cannot find symbol rsi.disabledText = text; ^ symbol: variable disabledText location: variable rsi of type RSInterface RSInterface.java:379: error: cannot find symbol rsi.valueCompareType = new int[1]; ^ symbol: variable valueCompareType location: variable rsi of type RSInterface RSInterface.java:380: error: cannot find symbol rsi.requiredValues = new int[1]; ^ symbol: variable requiredValues location: variable rsi of type RSInterface RSInterface.java:381: error: cannot find symbol rsi.valueCompareType[0] = 1; ^ symbol: variable valueCompareType location: variable rsi of type RSInterface RSInterface.java:382: error: cannot find symbol rsi.requiredValues[0] = configId; ^ symbol: variable requiredValues location: variable rsi of type RSInterface Note: client.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 22 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: Variable RequiredValues
item.dc:creator: @zRickyz zRickyz
item.description:

I’m trying to add new banking sprites & buttons to my client and it should be straight forward to follow the tutorial but for some reason Project Insanity always gives me errors lol. I’ve figured some stuff out myself getting rid of errors for other tutorials but this one has me stumped.
